name: Decide
description:
The Story tells of a young Teenager. Vacation in a lone cabine in the woods. Following a mysterious scream, the player encounters various animals. You choose if you want to interact with the animals. Your decision decides the world. 

The game sould show you in a way that people sould be nicer and more respectful to the enviroment or it might just fall apart.

The game contains 4 different endings.

Currently not all animals are interactable.

Controls:

Movement WASD

Interact E (you will see a text box if you are able to interact with something)

Pausemenu ESC
